title: Wupatki National Monument: News Releases
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     News     News Releases               News Releases           Subscribe  | What is RSS     May 12, 2016  Wupatki National Monument to Host Plein Air Artists as Part of NPS Centennial Celebration  On Saturday, May 14, 2016, Wupatki National Monument will host the Plein Air Artists of Northern Arizona at the Wupatki Visitor Center from 9am–1pm. Visitors are welcome to talk with artists and learn about what draws them to paint Wupatki Pueblo.   May 04, 2016  Flagstaff National Monuments Named International Dark Sky Parks  The National Park Service (NPS) and International Dark-Sky Association (IDA) are pleased to announce Flagstaff Area National Monuments—Sunset Crater Volcano, Walnut Canyon and Wupatki—have been designated as an International Dark Sky Park by the IDA.   April 22, 2016  Flagstaff Area National Monuments Create $36 Million in Benefits  Report shows visitor spending supports jobs in local economy.   January 22, 2016  Spring 2016 Discovery Hike and Crack-In-Rock Schedules Announced  Wupatki National Monument announces its schedule for Discovery Hikes and Crack-In-Rock Hikes to be held January through April, 2016.   August 21, 2014  Flagstaff Area National Monuments Superintendent Releases Updated Compendium  Flagstaff Area National Monuments Superintendent Announces New Compendium
